result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James E Schlosser

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.

Defendant James E Schlosser not in court, in custody.  Attorney John c Glover in court for James E Schlosser.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in for Order to Show Cause hearing. Defendant was not produced for hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Attorney John c Glover has been appointed by the Public Defender's Office. Defense has NOT received Discovery material the State. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing to allow time for Defense to receive and review Discovery materials. Case remains calendared in Branch 16.
Status hearing scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 9.23.22
Received and Filed. OSPD APPOINTMENT OF COUNSEL REPORT
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel.  Received and Filed. nk

Defendant James E Schlosser appeared by video, in custody, without counsel.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Calendar call. Based on defendant's appearance in court, by zoom, Court cancels stayed bench warrant. Court advised defendant the State Public Defender Office need additional time to appoint counsel. Case scheduled for order to show cause hearing; VIA ZOOM. Order to show cause hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Violation Report 9.13.22
Calendar call on September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant James E Schlosser not in court.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status Conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. Case adjourned for a Calendar Call to Br 16.
Calendar call scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and forwarded to Judge for review.  nk
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Status Report 8.2.22

Defendant James E Schlosser in court with attorney William Anthony Rakestraw.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  James E Schlosser appeared by video means. Defense has filed a motion to withdraw, defendant wishes to hire a private attorney. Court grants motion to withdraw, Attorney Rakestraw to notify SPD to reappoint. Case is adjourned in Branch 16.  Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: LVD
Defense Motion to Withdraw

OFF THE RECORD- Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw in court, defendant James E Schlosser not in court, in custody.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status Conference. Defendant not produced. Discussion with parties. Defense counsel advises that parties are now in a resolution posture. Court sets next court date for a Plea Hearing date. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw in court, defendant James E Schlosser not in court, in custody.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. All parties appeared via zoom. Defendant not produced. Defense counsel advises that they have received discovery materials and an offer from the state, but needs additional time to review with client. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant James E Schlosser in court with Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw; both appear by video.  Defendant James E Schlosser in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Fox Point Officer V. Walker.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Public Defender Order Appointing Counsel

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Defendant to be monitored by drug testing.

Defendant James E Schlosser in court with attorney Rosemary Cuevas.  Defendant James E Schlosser in custody.  Claire Louise Starling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  James E Schlosser appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for James E Schlosser
Current: 1704 Cedar Grove Dr, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 03-02-2022)
Prior: 2833 Riverside Drive, Green Bay, WI 54301
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
